summary: An ordinance accepting a deed from Clinton C. Berg and Lillian M. Berg, his wife, and Kalmer H. Berg and Nayome Berg, his wife, over a portion of Lots 1 and 2, Loma Vista Addition, in connection with the watermain pipe line right-of-way contemplated by Ordinance 85642 and 86134, and making an appropriation from the Water Fund as a betterment outlay and advance to Capital Account.
